channel.title: Need 718 Coder
channel.description:
I'm not really sure if this is actually Legal or not, if not, simply delete the thread, and I apologize.
Server Info:
I live in the U.S, and my coder currently lives in Australia. He just went into the 12th grade, so obviously, doesn't have much time for this. We're currently using a Rune-Evo base, but later tonight, we're going to be switching to a Matrix Base. The server is already online + is gaining players quickly. We have a very 'eye appealing' forums, and a VERY professional Web-Developer/Manager. The server is growing rapidly, it's been out for a month and we've already got almost $200 in donations. We currently have a 1 year Domain Plan for our IP board forums, and a very high valued, HQ VPS. It's on 24/7, and is yet to go offline.
What's Needed to Code for Us:
[ul][li]You must've coded a server before, not just brand new.[/li] [li]You must not be a brand new coder, obviously. You need to know how to code, and when it need's done and I ask for it to be, I expect it to be done.[/li] [li]You must be fairly active on your PC, and hopefully be on at least once a day.[/li][/ul]
If I think you're lacking any of these, you will be stripped of your rights. Thanks, if interested, comment below, and I'll get back with you.
